name: lsslmod
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))

stmt.origin: simplbda(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, clmod), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
stmt.pretty: simplbda(c0 ∈ LMod, c1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ LMod, c1 ⊆(Base ` c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c3, clmod))))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ⊆(Base ` c0)∧ c3 ∈ LMod)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c3, clmod))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ (c0 ∈ LMod →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ⊆(Base ` c0)∧ c3 ∈ LMod)))

stmt.origin: islss3(c0, c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c0), c3)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, clmod), wb(wcel(c1, c2), wa(wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c3, clmod))))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ LMod →(c1 ∈ c2 ↔(c1 ⊆(Base ` c0)∧ c3 ∈ LMod)))
⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, clmod), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, clmod))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cress, c1))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(clss, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ LMod ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ LMod)
⊣ c3 =(c0[|`s]c1)
⊣ c2 =(LSubSp ` c0)

comment: A submodule is a module. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Dec-2014.)
